title: Playoff Primer + Strength of Schedule League Winners - Fantasy Football Podcast for 11/17
description:
The Fantasy Footballers are back with a special episode as we enter Week 11! On today’s fantasy football podcast, it’s our annual Playoff Primer! Andy, Mike, and Jason highlight the best and worst playoff schedules for each position and how much it matters! Plus, the Week 11 edition of Buy or Sell, and a preview of Thursday Night Football. Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast -- Fantasy Football Podcast for November 17th, 2021.
  
 (04:50) - Buy or Sell
 (11:25) - News & Notes
 (18:15) - Playoff Primer
 (19:50) - QB Primer
 (32:20) - RB Primer
 (46:25) - WR Primer
 (52:35) - TE Primer
 (56:00) - DST Primer
 (58:55) - Thursday Night Breakdown - Patriots at Falcons
  
 Connect with the show:
  Subscribe on YouTube
